text: Chief Judge Merrick garland of the
federal appeals court in Washington is
well-liked well-respected universally
thought to be a careful judge with high
levels of judicial craftsmanship
intellect pragmatism and would be by
most standards a relative moderate
appointment to the Supreme Court by a
democratic president nonetheless it is
true that if he were to be appointed to
the court of his confirmation were
successful he would fill the ideological
zone that Justice Breyer currently fills
he would be the fifth member of a
liberal block on the court which would
dominate the courts work take away the
swing justice position from Justice
Anthony M Kennedy and that may be reason
enough for Republicans who in a
different time might have welcomed such
a nomination from a Democratic president
to as they say they will oppose it until
the next president gets to fill the seat
left vacant by the death of Justice
Antonin Scalia
Oh
